body: Hi guys, I´m trying run some e+ simulations that account for the benefit of adding louvers. I used the LB-Shading Designer to create some simple louvers based on solar vectors, unfortunately the HB-EP Context Surfaces is giving an error. As always, any support would be really appreaciated!, Alejandro [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/kZzo8PgK6ncNWqzMSrK0MnemdjsFRnMUU4EoxDv8V2-I2g0YzgoFk9qDmA34A*Z0WJ8-wSXfBF0KqeJ6sRza8NRrE*HPecFd/HBEPContextSurfacesIssue.png)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/kZzo8PgK6ndFcKP4p2GS0w2POLuassagovO*9QzIr*oXvQ1nncgLRjuwgQBMOWSt2cssD9PciUyAUSITa6T0FDd8VDQGh69W/HBEPContextSurfaces.png)
